means: 古希伯来或巴比伦的衡量单位（或钱币）( shekel的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: You look well, Tom. Still gathering in the shekels , eh?
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆,你看上去很好. 还在捞钱, 是 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: So they weighed out thirty shekels of silver as my wages.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是他们给了三十块钱作为我的工价.

sentence.Network_en: Or if it is a female, then your valuation shall be thirty shekels.
sentence.Network_cn: 利27:4若是女人 、 要估定三十舍客勒.

list.abs: So David gave to Ornan for the place hundred shekels of gold weight ., 于是大卫为那块地平了六百舍客勒金子给阿珥楠.
so they weighed out thirty shekels of silver as my wages .于是他们给了三十块钱作为我的工价。
and if it is a female setvalue at thirty shekels ., 若是女人 , 你要估定三十舍客勒.
The gold nails weighed fifty shekels . He also overlaid the upper parts with gold ., 金钉重五十舍客勒 . 楼房都贴上金子.
